Class CovariatesHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uib.triogen.model.covariates.CovariatesHandler

  • public class CovariatesHandler
extends Object
    Handler for covariates.
    Author:
    Marc Vaudel

      The number of neighbors to use when masking missing covariates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CovariatesHandler

        public CovariatesHandler(String[] phenotypeNames,
                         PhenotypesHandler phenotypesHandler,
                         String[] covariatesGeneral,
                         HashMap<String,TreeSet<String>> covariatesSpecific)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        phenotypeNames - The names of the phenotypes to load.
        phenotypesHandler - The phenotype handler to use.
        covariatesGeneral - The array of covariates to use for all phenotypes.
        covariatesSpecific - The map of covariates to use for phenotypes specifically.

    • Method Detail

      • getAdjustedValues

        public double[] getAdjustedValues(String phenoName)
        Removes the contribution of the covariates from the phenotypes and returns the new values.
        Parameters:
        phenoName - The name of the phenotype.
        Returns:
        The values adjusted for covariates.

      • getAdjustedValues

        public double[][] getAdjustedValues(String phenoName,
                                    double[][] x)
        Subtracts the contribution of the covariates to the columns in x.
        Parameters:
        phenoName - The name of the phenotype.
        x - The values to project.
        Returns:
        The projected values.

      • trim

        public void trim()
        Removes the raw pheno values to save memory.
